<h3 id="X35820">X(35820) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 1st KENMOTU-FREE-VERTICES TO ABC</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 3*a^4+2*S*a^2-(b^2+c^2)*a^2-2*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(35820) = 3*X(371)-4*X(7583) = 5*X(371)-6*X(32787) = 2*X(371)-3*X(35822) = 2*X(486)-3*X(35830) = 3*X(3070)-2*X(7583) = 5*X(3070)-3*X(32787) = 4*X(3070)-3*X(35822) = 2*X(3103)-3*X(35838) = 10*X(7583)-9*X(32787) = 8*X(7583)-9*X(35822) = 4*X(32787)-5*X(35822)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(4)</p>
<p>X(35820) lies on these lines:

<p>
X(35820) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (371, 3070), (490, 639), (35821, 7748), (35832, 32495)<br>
X(35820) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (3, 6564, 10576), (3, 23251, 6564), (4, 372, 6565), (4, 486, 35787), (4, 6460, 486), (4, 6560, 372), (6, 382, 35821), (20, 485, 6200), (20, 1131, 9540), (20, 23249, 485), (372, 486, 35814), (372, 35787, 486), (485, 6200, 35812), (485, 9680, 8972), (486, 6460, 372), (486, 6560, 6460), (486, 35787, 6565), (1131, 9540, 485), (3366, 3391, 6564), (6396, 35786, 5), (6460, 35787, 35814), (6560, 22644, 4), (6565, 35814, 486), (9540, 23249, 1131), (16964, 19107, 35821), (16965, 19106, 35821)<br>
